_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The effects of giving up greed, hatred,: They don’t intend to hurt themselves, hurt others, and hurt both
They don’t experience mental pain and sadness
They don’t do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind
They truly understand what’s for their own good, the good of another, or the good of both.
